alert.note: Alert for Alamosa Vicinity, Central San Luis Valley Below 8500 Ft; Del Norte Vicinity, Northern San Luis Valley Below 8500 Ft; Northern Sangre de Cristo Mountains Between 8500 And 11000 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 30 at 10:14PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Alamosa and southeastern Saguache Counties through 1045 PM MDT... At 1014 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Mosca, or 13 miles north of Alamosa, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Great Sand Dunes around 1020 PM MDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Alamosa Vicinity, Central San Luis Valley Below 8500 Ft; Del Norte Vicinity, Northern San Luis Valley Below 8500 Ft; Northern Sangre de Cristo Mountains Between 8500 And 11000 Ft
